bind.relevant: /data/child_info/add_vaccinations = 'yes' and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=current()/../cid]/date_je != '' and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=current()/../cid]/vit_a_3_date != '' and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=current()/../cid]/date_measles_booster != '' and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=current()/../cid]/hep_b_3_date != '' and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=current()/../cid]/dpt_booster_date != '' and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=current()/../cid]/opv_booster_date != '' and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=current()/../cid]/bcg_date != ''

text.value: टीकाकरण विवरण को भरना आवश्यक है।
डी. पी. टी - बूसटर की तारीख
खसरे का बूस्टर टीका की तारीख?
Details are needed to update the immunization record!
